instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332 battery stays at 15% several hours
threads.message: This macbook has faulty battery and I replaced with "new" chines battery. Sometimes it stays at 15% and later goes to 100%. It is bad battery or could be some mosfet also?

threads.title: 820-3332 battery stays at 15% several hours
threads.message: Sigh, why are you still asking? GARBAGE CHINESE JUNK!

threads.title: 820-3332 battery stays at 15% several hours
threads.message: I just tried with another battery and also slow charching and sometimes stays in 15% so I am not sure it both batteries has the some problem or could be also board problem.
